featured.text: His heart transplant surgery was more successful than Anthony’s.
What did Alfred and Anthony have in common? (A) Lifespan.
The discussion moved to Anthony’s recovery.
“Right now I feel pretty young and I’m doing very well,” Anthony said.
On Christmas Eve, 1992, Anthony had a heart transplant from a 21-year-old donor.

other.text: His new heart was younger than Anthony’s.
What did Alfred and Anthony think caused their heart problems? (A) Exercise.
His recovery from the heart surgery was faster than Anthony’s.
His exercise program was better than Anthony’s.

definition.zh_def: 安東尼，一個常見的男性名字。
definition.en_def: Anthony, a common male given name.
definition.example: Anthony is planning to travel to Europe next summer.
